synopsis:
Graduate Work 2012 from Hiroko Satsuma, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.

A sand man shows up in a childâ€™s bedroom at night. He invites a dusty stuffed animal on the shelf to go out over the hill. The child follows them to get his animal back into the darkness of night.

(Source: Geidai Animation)
